list.name: Arjuna
list.description: One of the main characters in the story. Drona's favourite student.

list.name: Bhima
list.description: One of the main characters in the story. The strongest of all

list.name: Draupadi
list.description: One of the main characters in the story. Wife of Pandavas

list.name: Kunti
list.description: One of the main characters in the story. Mother of Pandavas

list.name: Pandu
list.description: One of the main characters in the story.

list.name: Yudhishthira
list.description: One of the main characters in the story.

list.name: Satyavati
list.description: One of the main characters in the story.

list.name: Duryodhana
list.description: One of the main characters in the story. A Kaurava

list.name: Dushasana
list.description: Also a Kaurava

list.name: Vidura
list.description: One of the main characters in the story.

list.name: Nakula
list.description: One of the main characters in the story.

list.name: Krishna
list.description: One of the main characters in the story.

list.name: Sahadeva
list.description: Youngest of the Pandava brothers

list.name: Gandhari
list.description: Mother of 100 kauravas and a daughter

list.name: Dhritarashtra
list.description: One of the main characters in the story. Father of kauravas

list.name: Drona
list.description: Preceptor to the Kauravas and Pandavas

list.name: Subhadra
list.description: One of the wives of Arjuna

list.name: Abhimanyu
list.description: Son of Subhadra and Arjun

list.name: Hidimbi
list.description: Wife of Bhima

list.name: Ghatotkacha
list.description: Son of Bhima and Hidimbi
